Sentencas: Neutron powder diffraction was used to study the structure of the two ordered double perovskites A(2)CrTaO(6), A = Sr, Ca.
Titulo: Synthesis and structures of chromium double perovskites A2CrTaO6 (A = Sr, Ca)

Sentencas: It was shown that replacing Sr as the A-type cation introduced both in-phase and out-of-phase tilting of the octahedra and the structure changed from cubic in Fm3m with a = 7.8910(2) angstrom to monoclinic in P2(1)/n with a = 5.4283(l) A, b = 5.4904(10)angstrom, c = 7.7137(2)angstrom and beta = 89.99(1)degrees.
Titulo: Synthesis and structures of chromium double perovskites A2CrTaO6 (A = Sr, Ca)

Titulo: Synthesis and structures of chromium double perovskites A2CrTaO6 (A = Sr, Ca)
